What are the treatments for congenital plasminogen deficiency ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of congenital plasminogen deficiency:  - Genetic Testing Registry: Plasminogen deficiency, type I  - Indiana Hemophilia and Thrombosis Center  - Plasminogen Deficiency Registry   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnos
